data.event: Union County was formed in 1850 from portions of Grainger, Claiborne, Campbell, Anderson and Knox counties.

event.title: East Tennessee's support for the preservation of the Union in the years

data.event: The name may commemorate the "union" of sections of five counties, or it may reflect East Tennessee's support for the preservation of the Union in the years before the Civil War.
The park's recreational facilities opened in May 1934.
